title: Red screen caused by Carousel in develop on Android
body:
[comment]: # (Please replace ... with your information. Remove < and >)

### User Story

As a developer, I want to be able to use the app without getting a red screen everytime I go to a new screen

### Reproduction
[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- Open Status
- Log in
- Get this

![screenshot_1507579338](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1181225/31374119-f8f66266-ad9c-11e7-9442-84e1238669d8.png)

### Solution
[comment]: # (Please summarise the solution and provide a task list on what needs to be fixed.)
*Summary*: 

- root cause to be determined
- Carousel needs to be replaced or fixed

### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
* Status version: introduced here https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/4c8935a16f47889196a4be08ec66c56d61801c81#diff-fef3bc5137650ddba1a01f9f005cef9dR47

* Operating System: Android

Unable to reproduce on Genymotion on latest develop and API 23. Several other people have this though, and going to replace carousel with scrollable list regardless. Unclear if this is only on ADV or if people see it on Genymotion as well. Will see if this fixes the problem for others.
@angusiguess you see it on device too right? Can you elaborate on your environment, perhaps with a log? Would help reproducing and fixing this.

